H0.text: Infertility of the organism is the initial result if a DNA molecule does not replicate accurately.

H1.text: Incorrect protein synthesis is the initial result when a DNA molecule does not replicate accurately.

H2.text: An increase in reproduction rate is the initial result when a DNA molecule does not replicate accurately.

H3.text: Immediate death of the organism is the initial result if a DNA molecule does not replicate accurately.

A4.text: At the cellular level, mutations can alter protein function and regulation.

A5.text: DNA replication may also be blocked and/or the cell may die.
